body_html:
@kaspermarstal Thanks, I think your PR is related to my previous problem, I will check the CMakeLists file. My second issue is due to the contrib/nccl/ project has two wrong include path, already fixed.
Now struggle with the final link step... let's make the cmake build more friendly for linux.

body:
@kaspermarstal Thanks, I think your PR is related to my previous problem, I will check the CMakeLists file. My second issue is due to the contrib/nccl/ project has two wrong include path, already fixed.
Now struggle with the final link step... let's make the cmake build more friendly for linux.
